name: CashFlow Pro
problem: ** 60% of Indian SMEs manage invoices in spreadsheets; lose ₹50L-1Cr/year to late payments
tasks: Create landing page highlighting "Get paid 30 days faster" (CashFlow-specific benefit)
Run Google Ads targeting "invoice management," "payment collection," "SME accounting"
Budget: ₹2000 for 5-7 days; target 50-100 clicks; measure signup rate (target 30%+)
Conduct 15-20 cold calls to CA firms, business centers, MSME clusters
Measure pain point confirmation (target 50%+ saying "this is a real problem")
Record willingness-to-pay mentions (target ₹300+ ARPU minimum validation)
Invoice generation + customizable templates
Payment tracking dashboard (status: draft, sent, partial, paid, overdue)
Automated payment reminders (email + SMS via Twilio)
Integration with bank APIs (HDFC/ICICI for auto-reconciliation)
GST billing compliance (GSTR calculations auto-updated)
UPI payment widget (embedded payment collection)
Analytics: Late payment trends, cash flow forecast by 30/60/90 days
Expand to inventory tracking for retail SMEs
Add expense management (accounts payable matching)
Integrate with accounting apps (Tally ERP, Zoho Books)
B2B partnerships with BFSIs, CA firms, GST consultants (revenue share)
Target 200+ paying customers by Month 6; ₹4-6 Lakh MRR by Month 12

name: LocalDeals
problem: ** Tier 2/3 retail (rag stores, paan shops, kirana) have NO loyalty program; losing 20% repeat customers
market: ** 1M+ retail stores in India (TAM: ₹1,00,000 Cr retail economy)
revenue: ** Freemium: Free for 1 store; ₹500-1000/month per additional store
tasks: Create video demo: "Turn your kirana into a loyalty program in 2 minutes"
Instagram/YouTube Ads targeting retail owners in major cities
Budget: ₹2000; target 100 views, 20 clicks, 5 signups (measure landing page conversion)
Walk into 20 local stores; pitch 5-minute demo; measure buyer interest (target 50% interested)
Ask: "Would you pay ₹500-1000/month for this?" (target 40%+ saying "yes")
Retail dashboard: Customer card issuance + balance tracking
Digital card (QR code scannable in-store; loyalty points auto-updated)
Offer creation: Create discount offers (Buy 2 get 1 free, ₹500 spend = ₹50 points)
Customer app: Customers see nearby store offers, scan QR, auto-apply points
Payment integration: UPI payment from loyalty balance
Analytics: Repeat customer rate, avg transaction value, points redemption rate
Expand to Swiggy/Zomato-like aggregation (become marketplace hub for local offers)
Add supplier/distributor integration (give retailers bulk purchase discounts)
B2B partnerships with retail chains, mall owners, trade associations
Target 500+ stores by Month 6; ₹3-4 Lakh MRR by Month 12

name: DocVerify
problem: ** 70% of SMEs struggle with GST compliance; face ₹50K-1Cr in penalties annually
tasks: Create audit checklist: "GST compliance in 10 minutes" (solve compliance fear)
LinkedIn/Email campaign to CA firms, tax consultants, MSME business groups
Cold calls to 25+ CA firms; offer 50% commission on referrals (target 10 warm leads)
Measure: "Would your clients pay ₹5000-15000/month for this?" (target 60%+ saying "yes")
Document scanner: Upload invoices, GST receipts, TDS certificates (OCR extraction)
Compliance validator: Flags missing docs, duplicates, GST/ITR filing gaps
Auto-filing engine: Pre-fills GSTR forms based on uploaded documents
Penalty alerts: Notify when GST filing deadline approaching (customize reminder timing)
Integration: Connect to GST portal, bank APIs, CA software (Tally, Zoho)
Dashboard: Compliance status scorecard (% complete for each filing period)
Expand to TDS management, income tax filing automation
B2B partnerships with tax software (Cleartax, ClearVoice), bank portals, MSME platforms
White-label solution for accountant firms (use our engine, rebrand)
Target 150-200 paying customers by Month 12; ₹7-10 Lakh MRR

name: SkillMatch
problem: ** SMEs waste ₹2-5L/year on fixed salaries for part-time roles; can't find skilled freelancers
market: ** 500 Cr SME HR budget; 10% could shift to gig model = ₹50 Cr TAM
tasks: Build minimal MVP (job board only), test with 50 SMEs

name: TeachPro
description: Online Teaching Platform for Skill Trainers
problem: ** 5M+ skill trainers in India lack distribution; relying on low-margin offline classes
market: ** ₹300 Cr upskilling market; 15% shift to online = ₹45 Cr TAM
tasks: Create course from 3 real trainers; pre-sell 50 students
